name: Dogmatika Genesis
effectText: Target 1 banished Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Monster, and 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls of the same type (Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link); return that banished monster to the Extra Deck, and if you do, negate the effects of that monster your opponent controls. You can only activate 1 "Dogmatika Genesis" per turn.
